hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported the Prophet (ﷺ) as saying:If any one forgets a prayer or oversleeps, he should observe it when he remembers it ; there is no expiation for it except that

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي مَنْ نَامَ عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ، أَوْ نَسِيَهَا
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Sleeps Through The Prayer (Time) Or Forgets (To Pray)
